content.rendered: Jeunes Scolarisés is a local Community-Based Organization (CBO) dedicated to empowering youth and their families to achieve their dreams in safe, healthy, and stable environments. We accomplish this mission by providing various opportunities and support to the youth, ensuring they have access to essential resources and services.

excerpt.rendered: Initiative des Jeunes Scolarisés pour le Development Durable “Jeunes Scolarisés” is a local Community-Based Organization (CBO) legally established and initially registered at the Rwanda Governance Board (RDB) in 2001. We are dedicated to empowering youth and their families to achieve their dreams in safe, healthy, and stable environments
